title: Dimitri Payet is brutally trolled by West Ham fans after his return to action for Marseille
text:
Payet trolled Dimitri Payet is brutally trolled by West Ham fans after his return to action for Marseille 
Payet made a hero's return to Marseille but couldn't stop his side losing at struggling Metz on Friday by Warren Haughton Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments DIMITRI PAYET suffered an unhappy return to Marseille, but it got worse as he was brutally trolled by West Ham fans for walking out on the club. 
The Frenchman controversially returned to Marseille last month for £25million after telling the Premier League side he wanted out, months after signing a new lucrative deal. AP:Associated Press 4 Payet finally got his wish to return to Marseille last month 
The 29-year-old posted a clip of himself coming on as an extra time substitute in the French Cup win against Lyon on Instagram. 
Keep up to date with ALL the West Ham news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
The clip was posted to celebrate his delight at returning to the south of France, but it came as no surprise when Hammers who still feel betrayed by their current player of the year jumped all over his post to vent their fury. 
They posted a series of pictures of a snake, alongside images of bags of money, wads of cash and credit cards, leaving no one in any doubt that some fans consider him a money-grabbing traitor. Despite coming on from the subs’ bench again last Friday, he could not help his new team-mates as Marseille lost to Ligue 1 strugglers Metz last friday. 
Payet's search for a first league win since rejoining the French giants will continue on Wednesday when they host Guingamp at the Velodrome.
